content.rendered:
About Us

BoxSafe's Mission

Welcome to BoxSafe: Your Pathway To Excellence in Boxing Officiating and Training.

At BoxSafe, we understand that the backbone of every successful boxing event isn’t just the athletes in the ring but the dedicated officials who ensure the integrity, safety, and smooth execution of the sport. Whether you’re a timekeeper, trainer, referee, or judge, your role is crucial in shaping the future of boxing. That’s why we’ve developed a comprehensive certification process tailored specifically for you. Our mission at BoxSafe is simple yet profound: to elevate the standards of boxing officiating and training at every level, from novice to elite. We believe that empowering officials with the right knowledge, skills, and credentials can foster a safer and more professional boxing environment. At BoxSafe, we aim to elevate the standards of boxing officiating and training for timekeepers, trainers, referees, and judges at every level.

At BoxSafe, we aim to elevate the standards of boxing officials and training for timekeepers, trainers, referees and judges at every level.

 Our comprehensive certification programs, led by seasoned professionals with over 40 years of combined experience in the combat sports sector, ensure the integrity and safety of the sport. Our flexible training options, including online and in-person modules, offer a wealth of resources such as video tutorials, live webinars, and detailed reading materials. BoxSafe provides continuous support, networking opportunities, and access to the latest industry updates, fostering a dedicated community of professionals.

Our programs range from novice to elite certifications.

Covering fundamental rules, advanced techniques, and high-level officiating skills necessary for national and international competitions. Additionally, BoxSafe offers tailor-made, affordable courses designed for a career in combat sports. Want to be a certified boxing official? BoxSafe training and officiating is the official home of boxing-certified courses. Sign up now to have the best seat in the house in the fastest-growing combat sports scene. Join BoxSafe today to enhance your skills, expand your professional network, and contribute to a safer, more professional boxing world. Visit our website to learn more about our certification programs, schedule, and enrolment process. BoxSafe: Empowering the Officials Behind the Champions.
